it.polimi.rtag.messaging
Class Ack

java.lang.Object
  polimi.reds.Message
      it.polimi.rtag.messaging.Ack
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Ack
extends polimi.reds.Message

Author:
Panteha Saeedi (saeedi@elet.polimi.it)

. Defines the content of an acknowledge message sent to notify the reception of a communication.
See Also:
MessageSubjects.COMMUNICATION_ACK, Serialized Form

Field Detail

OK

public static final java.lang.String OK
The message was received and the recipient was correct.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NOT_GROUP_LEADER

public static final java.lang.String NOT_GROUP_LEADER
The message was received but the recipient was not a group leader and therefore it is not allowed to forward the message.

This happens when sending an anycast or a multicast.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NOT_GROUP_FOLLOWER

public static final java.lang.String NOT_GROUP_FOLLOWER
The message was received correctly but the recipient is no longer in that group.

See Also:
